examples: Both men wore confident smiles.
She felt confident and beautiful in her new swimsuit.
I'm confident that the new restaurant will go like a bomb and become a popular dining destination.
And nothing was so irritating as the confident way he used archaic idiom.
During the chess tournament, Jane was confident in her skills, but her opponent ended up cleaning her clock with a series of surprising moves.
words.defineEn: being certain about our plans, abilities, the future, etc. and believing that we can gain success
words.defineVi: chắc chắn về kế hoạch, khả năng, tương lai của mình, v.v. và tin rằng chúng ta có thể đạt được thành công

examples: The girl with the carrot top confidently embraces her unique hair color, radiating a sense of individuality.
The salesman confidently presented his product, knowing that good wine needs no bush.
She held her head high as she walked confidently into the room.
The expert confidently stated that it had been sunny with excellent visibility on the day in question.
No one could confidently know the age of the earth before the discovery of radioactivity and the development of radiometric dating in the early twentieth century.
words.defineEn: in a way that shows confidence and trust in oneself or another person's abilities, plans, etc.
words.defineVi: theo cách thể hiện sự tự tin và tin tưởng vào khả năng, kế hoạch của bản thân hoặc người khác, v.v.

examples: No one could shed any light on the mysterious car accident.
Love is mysterious though.
Dark energy is far more mysterious.
Others had died mysterious deaths.
And some high-altitude adaptations remain mysterious!
words.defineEn: difficult or impossible to comprehend, identify, or explain
words.defineVi: khó hoặc không thể hiểu, xác định hoặc giải thích

examples: Early in the history of our solar system, something mysteriously knocked Earth slightly off its axis.
Last year it discovered that levels of methane in the atmosphere were mysteriously changing.
"Ace detective Harry Goodman goes mysteriously missing, "prompting his 21-year-old son, Tim, to find out what happened.
It’s also a place known for mysteriously burning ground fires caused by natural gas leaking to the surface, but to humans of the time, a fire breathing goat was just as likely.
Bitcoin was mysteriously introduced in 2009 by an anonymous programmer, or more probably a group of programmers, using the alias Satoshi Nakamoto.
words.defineEn: in a manner that is not easy to explain or understand
words.defineVi: theo cách đó là không dễ dàng để giải thích hoặc hiểu

examples: They keep a small eraser in their pencil case for quick corrections.
Just a quick note to say thank you for a wonderful evening.
He was quick to point a finger at his coworkers.
The tabloids were quick to label the famous actor as a backdoor man after rumors circulated about his affairs with multiple co-stars.
I'll be back quicker than you can say Jack Robinson.
words.defineEn: taking a short time to move, happen, or be done
words.defineVi: mất một thời gian ngắn để di chuyển, xảy ra, hoặc được thực hiện

examples: The time passed quickly.
The cruise went very quickly.
The eggs cook quickly in a hot frying pan.
The worm turns quickly in the world of politics.
The new student quickly made friends with the other musicians, because birds of a feather flock together.
The library is often quiet during weekdays.
Be quiet, please.
We lead a very quiet life.
Surprisingly, the quiet neighborhood came alive with vibrant festivities during the annual festival.
You've been awfully quiet tonight, honey.
words.defineEn: (of a person) not talking too much
words.defineVi: (của một người) không nói quá nhiều

examples: The children were all sitting quietly and listening.
I was in Vienna sitting quietly in a café when, lo and behold, my cousin walked in.
We all sat sipping our tea quietly, no one wanting to bring up the white elephant in the room about Joel's expulsion from college.
the doctor asked Mr. Rinaldi quietly.
Quietly, their boat moved nearer.
words.defineEn: in a manner that makes very little or no noise
words.defineVi: theo cách mà làm cho rất ít hoặc không có tiếng ồn

examples: Keep your passport in a safe place.
After all, the highest branch is not the safest roost.
You can feel as safe as houses here with electric entrance gates.
Don't worry, Uncle Tim, your future is safe in our hands.
I always put my important documents in a safe deposit box at the bank because safe bind, safe find.
words.defineVi: không có nguy hiểm hoặc tổn hại

examples: The taxi driver drove us to the airport quickly and safely.
The island had a famous lighthouse that guided ships safely to shore.
When Mac was safely out of the way, Peter came round.
If Chris phones to say they arrived safely, that really puts my mind at rest.
Let her come home safely!
words.defineEn: in a safe and secure manner
words.defineVi: một cách an toàn và bảo mật

examples: The closed window blocked out the noise from the street.
The dishwasher is making a strange noise.
The sudden noise made her start.
Local residents have raised concerns about late-night noise.
The constant noise from the construction site vexed the residents of the neighborhood.
words.defineEn: sounds that are usually unwanted or loud
words.defineVi: âm thanh thường không mong muốn hoặc lớn

examples: She turned a page noisily.
He never stops hitting it noisily, hour after hour.
words.defineEn: in a way that makes too much sound or disturbance
words.defineVi: trong một cách mà làm cho quá nhiều âm thanh hoặc xáo trộn

examples: Careful planning laid the foundations for the nation’s economic miracle.
Be careful with your actions.
Be extra careful with this one.
Do be careful, for goodness' sake.
If you cannot be good, be careful.
words.defineEn: giving attention or thought to what we are doing to avoid doing something wrong, hurting ourselves, or damaging something
words.defineVi: chú ý hoặc suy nghĩ về những gì chúng ta đang làm để tránh làm sai, làm tổn thương bản thân hoặc làm hỏng thứ gì đó

examples: The chef carefully arranged the arugula leaves on the plate as a beautiful garnish.
The child carefully planted caryopses of wildflowers in the garden.
The lioness carefully groomed her newborn baby.
Please drive carefully.
She carefully sprinkled sunflower seeds on top of her homemade bread dough.
words.defineEn: with a lot of care or attention
words.defineVi: với rất nhiều quan tâm hoặc chú ý

examples: Are you feeling comfortable?
He always wears comfortable clothes when he goes for a run.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
The room had a comfortable bed where she could rest.
The rug in front of the fireplace provides a comfortable spot to sit.
words.defineEn: physically feeling relaxed and not feeling pain, stress, fear, etc.
words.defineVi: thể chất cảm thấy thoải mái và không cảm thấy đau đớn, căng thẳng, sợ hãi, v.v.

examples: Six people, and more at a pinch, could be seated comfortably at the table.
After years of financial mismanagement, Liz realized she needed to get her house in order by paying down debts and creating a budget if she wanted to retire comfortably one day.
They live comfortably.
What sleep positions can I comfortably be in?
You couldn't comfortably fit three people on a single seat anyway.
words.defineEn: in a way that is physically free from any tension or pain
words.defineVi: theo cách mà thể chất không bị căng thẳng hay đau đớn
